title: Essence Converter for Hextech Crafting
body:
For people with all of the champions Blue Essence and Champion shards are useless and such a high chance to get.
I think there should be a converter to convert Blue Essence into Orange Essence and vice versa.

Just a suggestion...

replies.body:
Even if they convert it with a 1 blue essence = .75 or .5 orange essence.

Because right now, like my ip balance, it feels like it will just continue to increase with nothing to spend it on.

This should have been extremely obvious to Riot, but obvious things seem to fly right past them these days. Yes, this is a good idea and yes, please implement it.

They should start calling "Common Sense" "Rare Sense"
